[@mary](@SXVoA/7CuMRS5IDTNsO8HU2PvCIVq8HKUUx/k+idDiQ=.ed25519) 

I remember a while back you shared a link to a community to-do list app, sort of like GitHub issues except people could vote on what they thought was important (IIRC). Do you remember what that was called? I tried to search but couldn't find it.
